faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Dine Dash

q1.question: How do customers access the menu?
q1.answer: Customers simply scan the QR code on their table using their smartphone camera. This opens the digital menu instantly in their browser - no app download required.

q2.question: Can I update my menu in real-time?
q2.answer: Yes! You can update prices, add new items, or modify descriptions instantly through our dashboard. Changes appear immediately on all customer devices.

q3.question: What if customers don't have smartphones?
q3.answer: We provide backup options including a simple web link that can be typed manually, and you can still maintain a few physical menus for customers who prefer them.

q4.question: Is there a setup fee?
q4.answer: No setup fees! We offer a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. You only pay after you're satisfied with the service.

q5.question: Do you provide customer support?
q5.answer: Yes! We offer email support for all plans, priority support for Professional plans, and 24/7 phone support for Enterprise customers.
